about_the_game:
When this patch is installed, UnHolY DisAsTeR will be changed to R-18 version.

· Added R-18 action.
- Added game over movies.
· Added gallery "Monster".

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following sexual scenes.

Sexual activity
Sexual violence
The heroine is raped by the monster.

name: UnHolY DisAsTeR "R-18 Patch"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Resolution:1024x768 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit stereo 44.1kHz or 48kHz WAV support
